00011 DefensivePreyFamily::DefensivePreyFamily()
00012 {
00013     behaviors[PASSIVE] = new CarefulPrey();
00014     behaviors[STALKING] = behaviors[PASSIVE];
00015     behaviors[PURSUING] = behaviors[PASSIVE];
00016     behaviors[CAUTIOUS] = new DefensivePrey();
00017     behaviors[FLEEING] = behaviors[CAUTIOUS];
00018 }

00020 DefensivePreyFamily::~DefensivePreyFamily()

00023     delete behaviors[CAUTIOUS];
